channel.title: 317 Pk-Xile
channel.description:
To be continued. [center] Features [center]Introduction: pk-xile is known as one of the best most stable servers out there with flawless player vs player combat, with many minigames to play, many monsters to defeat, for ways to get unspawnable items, and much more, pk-xile continues to build and improve to your likings we are open to your suggestion for improvement. You say We do!
[img]http://i.imgur.com/1klA6.png[/img][url=http://pk-xile.com]Home || pk-xile[/url] [img]http://i56.tinypic.com/imijbl.png[/img][url=http://pk-xile.com/forums/index.php?page=webclient]Play Now || pk-xile[/url] [img]http://i.imgur.com/qgacD.png[/img][url=http://pk-xile.com/vote.php]Vote || pk-xile[/url]
Features -Working EP System -New combaticons working 100% -New hitmarks -Amzing fullscreen, one of the best -Working clan wars -Working 100% quik prayers -Worlwide skilling -All skills working -New bosses such as Seat troll and barrelchest -Kalphite queen morphing -Pest Control -Fight Arena -Flawless switching -Working Rune essence mining area -3 level slayer tower -Leeches working 100% -Working hand cannon w/ special -Working xp counter -Auto donation system -Vote for rewards system -Overload's -Npc clipping 100% -Player clipping 100% -SOL working special attack -All dupes patched -Memory leak/Deadlocks have been patched -Can hold 400 players no lag (tested) -Smf Forums -Dedicated Server -Vote for Rewards -All Skills Trainable -All bosses you can think of -Active Community & Forums -New Client Interfaces -Friendly Staff -Great combat -Godwars -Public Fight Cave -Working Autocasting -Clue Scrolls -Pvp Armour -Spirit Shields with proper effects -Fully Working ClanChat -Multi Barrage -Perfect Item Switching -Npcs/Monster locations same as on Runescape -Donator special features -Great PK Point system + PK Point Shop [/center]
Screenshots
Starter - Some Tips [img]http://img444.imageshack.us/img444/4207/115401942c984a9abee4c83.png[/img]
Home - Pvp - Home Area is Safe [img]http://img38.imageshack.us/img38/8218/f52ede2601244c05930e941.png[/img]
Major Cities are Pvp Hotspots [img]http://img21.imageshack.us/img21/7529/7264e3f40c404fb891b9028.png[/img]
Pvp - + 12 and - 12 for combat [img]http://img713.imageshack.us/img713/9397/a51fb0db276c464fbd6edc9.png[/img] [img]http://img607.imageshack.us/img607/6250/93a2363b48624623a96bd4b.png[/img]
Turmoil - No OverPowered Prayers [img]http://img703.imageshack.us/img703/7982/7ea7de51ce3e4dccb42a057.png[/img]
Multi Skin Colors + More [img]http://img41.imageshack.us/img41/2886/5cbbec2779e34140a081ff7.png[/img][img]http://img440.imageshack.us/img440/4435/1cd95ccc064749dcac828a3.png[/img][img]http://img507.imageshack.us/img507/9707/12f6458c447546a8a0c081e.png[/img][img]http://img805.imageshack.us/img805/4707/b153979c712d4b1a9b8772c.png[/img]
Clan Chat System [img]http://img84.imageshack.us/img84/8002/f298f43faf5e4fa985c1c29.png[/img] [img]http://img854.imageshack.us/img854/5697/86c3035938fc4bd1a7135d3.png[/img] [img]http://img577.imageshack.us/img577/8053/7cd8d69bcce84305a3a76e5.png[/img]
Skills - Did a quick preview of some of the skills... Didn't put much effort forth into the picture. [img]http://imgtool.in/img/skillsgsg.png[/img]
[/center]

item.title: 317 Pk-Xile
item.dc:creator: @High105 High105
item.description:
@High105 wrote:

To be continued.
[center]
Features
[center]Introduction:
pk-xile is known as one of the best most stable servers out there with flawless player vs player combat, with many minigames to play, many monsters to defeat, for ways to get unspawnable items, and much more, pk-xile continues to build and
improve to your likings we are open to your suggestion for improvement. You say We do!

Home || pk-xile
Play Now || pk-xile
Vote || pk-xile

Features
-Working EP System
-New combaticons working 100%
-New hitmarks
-Amzing fullscreen, one of the best
-Working clan wars
-Working 100% quik prayers
-Worlwide skilling
-All skills working
-New bosses such as Seat troll and barrelchest
-Kalphite queen morphing
-Pest Control
-Fight Arena
-Flawless switching
-Working Rune essence mining area
-3 level slayer tower
-Leeches working 100%
-Working hand cannon w/ special
-Working xp counter
-Auto donation system
-Vote for rewards system
-Overload’s
-Npc clipping 100%
-Player clipping 100%
-SOL working special attack
-All dupes patched
-Memory leak/Deadlocks have been patched
-Can hold 400 players no lag (tested)
-Smf Forums
-Dedicated Server
-Vote for Rewards
-All Skills Trainable
-All bosses you can think of
-Active Community & Forums
-New Client Interfaces
-Friendly Staff
-Great combat
-Godwars
-Public Fight Cave
-Working Autocasting
-Clue Scrolls
-Pvp Armour
-Spirit Shields with proper effects
-Fully Working ClanChat
-Multi Barrage
-Perfect Item Switching
-Npcs/Monster locations same as on Runescape
-Donator special features
-Great PK Point system + PK Point Shop
[/center]

Screenshots

Starter - Some Tips

Home - Pvp - Home Area is Safe

Major Cities are Pvp Hotspots

Pvp - + 12 and - 12 for combat

Turmoil - No OverPowered Prayers

Multi Skin Colors + More

Clan Chat System


Skills - Did a quick preview of some of the skills… Didn’t put much effort forth into the picture.

[/center]
